titles.title: A bill to designate the United States courthouse at South Federal Place in Santa Fe, New Mexico, as the "Santiago E. Campos United States Courthouse".

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S914)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary:
1/23/2007--Introduced.
Designates the U.S. courthouse located at South Federal Place in Santa Fe, New Mexico, as the "Santiago E. Campos United States Courthouse."
